thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 5 of 259
thread.title: Ellexus

author: Ellexus
title: Ellexus
text: I was looking to get my dad a Movado watch for Christmas, and after a ton of searching I found the perfect watch. The only issue was that it was incredibly close to the holiday and none of the retailers I found would be able to get it to me before the holiday. Luckily after lots of panicked searching I found his watch on Jomashop, for a better price, and they were going to be able to ship it to me prior to the holiday. My dads gift arrived several days before the holiday and in perfect condition! He couldn't have been happier.
